entities.description: Attempt to cut down or stop using prescription sedatives in the past 12 months.
Being unable to cut down or stop using prescription sedatives more than once in the past 12 months.
Often wishing to cut down or stop using prescription sedatives in the past 12 months.
Any long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or made worse by using a prescription sedative in the past 12 months.
